overview: A certified accountant, Philip Eilenberg has broad experience in financial management and long-term financial growth strategies, both within and outside the IT industry. Prior to joining GFG Group, he was financial controller at Cardlink Systems, a leading New Zealand provider of fuel card software, taxi card software and loyalty software. Prior to Cardlink Systems he was finance manager at Australasian audio-visual presentation equipment company, Boyd Audio Visuals. Earlier in his career, he gained valuable public company experience, working at a corporate level for commercial property investment and development companies Renouf Corporation and Baker Corporation.
